P 401 (MariaDB get endpoint auth issue)

Both services are running properly. The issue is only with the /mem/get endpoint authentication. Let's debug this specific issue:
bash# Test the /mem/get endpoint directly on the backend
curl -s "http://<redacted.ip>:40001/mem/get?id=1369de11-d01f-4cb5-9b37-87d26ef0677b&key=public-read-2025" | head -10

# Compare with the working search endpoint
curl -s "http://<redacted.ip>:40001/mem/search?limit=1&key=public-read-2025" | head -5

# Check if there's a difference in the auth logic
grep -A 10 -B 5 "check_read_auth" /var/www/memory_system/memory_app.py
The issue might be in the check_read_auth() function or how the /mem/get route handles authentication differently than /mem/search.
